title: Heart of the Father

tokens.lyric: Longing to live in deepest joy and love eternal,

lines.raw: [Eb]Longing to live in deepest joy and love eternal,

tokens.lyric: God was ever seeking for a people all His own.

lines.raw: [Gm]God was ever seeking for a people all His own.

tokens.lyric: Who can know the yearning of His lonely broken heart?

lines.raw: [Cm]Who can know the yearning of His lonely broken heart?

tokens.lyric: Tears were falling as a river through His countless years alone.

lines.raw: [Fm]Tears were falling as a river through His countless years alone.

tokens.lyric: Out of all the multitude there was none who knew

lines.raw: [Cm]Out of all the multitude there was none who knew

tokens.lyric: How the Father's heart was aching, grieving after man.

lines.raw: [Ab]How the Father's heart was aching, grieving after man.

tokens.lyric: Glorious God, who started life throughout the heavens,

lines.raw: [Eb]Glorious God, who started life throughout the heavens,

tokens.lyric: Bore the deepest torture as He saw His children die.

lines.raw: [Gm]Bore the deepest torture as He saw His children die.

tokens.lyric: Every day He seeks the beauty lost inside our hearts,

lines.raw: [Cm]Every day He seeks the beauty lost inside our hearts,

tokens.lyric: Tenderly with love He leads us back to life with Him on high.

lines.raw: [Fm]Tenderly with love He leads us back to life with Him on high.

tokens.lyric: How many fathoms deep is His aching heart?

lines.raw: [Cm]How many fathoms deep is His aching heart?

tokens.lyric: All the tears He shed for earth became an endless sea.

lines.raw: [Ab]All the tears He shed for earth became an endless sea.

tokens.lyric: Deep from within the heart of heaven came the secret,

lines.raw: [Eb]Deep from within the heart of heaven came the secret,

tokens.lyric: Now the mighty word, the trumpet call will surely sound.

lines.raw: [Gm]Now the mighty word, the trumpet call will surely sound.

tokens.lyric: But as in the time of Noah people laugh and mock,

lines.raw: [Cm]But as in the time of Noah people laugh and mock,

tokens.lyric: Satisfied to wander aimless in the darkness underground.

lines.raw: [Fm]Satisfied to wander aimless in the darkness underground.

tokens.lyric: Fearful is the time to come when the price is paid!

lines.raw: [Cm]Fearful is the time to come when the price is paid!

tokens.lyric: One and all will face the judgment from an angry God.

lines.raw: [Ab]One and all will face the judgment from an angry God.

tokens.lyric: Quickly believe, my people quickly turn and follow!

lines.raw: [Eb]Quickly believe, my people quickly turn and follow!

tokens.lyric: You can be enfolded in the warmth of Father's heart.

lines.raw: [Gm]You can be enfolded in the warmth of Father's heart.

tokens.lyric: All the joy that life can offer calls us home to Him,

lines.raw: [Cm]All the joy that life can offer calls us home to Him,

tokens.lyric: Now He calls you to be near Him never again to be apart.

lines.raw: [Fm]Now He calls you to be near Him never again to be apart.

tokens.lyric: When at last we run to Him, how He'll cry with joy!

lines.raw: [Cm]When at last we run to Him, how He'll cry with joy!

tokens.lyric: All rejoicing, all together now and evermore.

lines.raw: [Ab]All rejoicing, all together now and evermore.
